targets.queryText: SELECT sum(money) from  shrq_billxxxxxxx where date LIKE '${year}-%' ORDER by date desc limit 1
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT sum(money) from  shrq_billxxxxxxx where date LIKE '${year}-%' ORDER by date desc limit 1

targets.queryText: SELECT yearConsumption from  shrq_billxxxxxxx where date LIKE '${year}-%' ORDER by date desc limit 1
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT yearConsumption from  shrq_billxxxxxxx where date LIKE '${year}-%' ORDER by date desc limit 1

targets.queryText: SELECT money from  shrq_billxxxxxxx where date LIKE '${year}-%' ORDER by date desc limit 1
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT money from  shrq_billxxxxxxx where date LIKE '${year}-%' ORDER by date desc limit 1

targets.queryText: SELECT price from  shrq_billxxxxxxx where date LIKE '${year}-%' ORDER by date desc limit 1
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT price from  shrq_billxxxxxxx where date LIKE '${year}-%' ORDER by date desc limit 1

targets.queryText: SELECT consumption from  shrq_billxxxxxxx where date LIKE '${year}-%' ORDER by date desc limit 1
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT consumption from  shrq_billxxxxxxx where date LIKE '${year}-%' ORDER by date desc limit 1

targets.queryText: SELECT currentReading from  shrq_billxxxxxxx where date LIKE '${year}-%' ORDER by date desc limit 1
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT currentReading from  shrq_billxxxxxxx where date LIKE '${year}-%' ORDER by date desc limit 1

targets.queryText:
SELECT 
    SUBSTR(date, 1, 7) AS "日期",
    money AS "金额/CNY"
FROM 
    shrq_billxxxxxxx
WHERE 
    date LIKE '${year}-%'
ORDER BY 
    date ASC
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT 
    SUBSTR(date, 1, 7) AS "日期",
    money AS "金额/CNY"
FROM 
    shrq_billxxxxxxx
WHERE 
    date LIKE '${year}-%'
ORDER BY 
    date ASC

targets.queryText:
SELECT 
    SUBSTR(date, 1, 7) AS "日期",
    consumption AS "用量/立方"
FROM 
    shrq_billxxxxxxx
WHERE 
    date LIKE '${year}-%'
ORDER BY 
    date ASC
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT 
    SUBSTR(date, 1, 7) AS "日期",
    consumption AS "用量/立方"
FROM 
    shrq_billxxxxxxx
WHERE 
    date LIKE '${year}-%'
ORDER BY 
    date ASC

targets.queryText:
SELECT 
    SUBSTR(date, 1, 7) AS "日期",
    sumpay AS "金额/￥"
FROM 
    pdwly_billxxxxxxx
WHERE 
    date LIKE '${year}-%'
ORDER BY 
    date ASC
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT 
    SUBSTR(date, 1, 7) AS "日期",
    sumpay AS "金额/￥"
FROM 
    pdwly_billxxxxxxx
WHERE 
    date LIKE '${year}-%'
ORDER BY 
    date ASC

targets.queryText:
SELECT 
    SUBSTR(date, 1, 7) AS "日期",
    (waternum + dirtynum) AS "用量/立方"
FROM 
    pdwly_billxxxxxxx
WHERE 
    date LIKE '${year}-%'
ORDER BY 
    date ASC
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT 
    SUBSTR(date, 1, 7) AS "日期",
    (waternum + dirtynum) AS "用量/立方"
FROM 
    pdwly_billxxxxxxx
WHERE 
    date LIKE '${year}-%'
ORDER BY 
    date ASC

targets.queryText: SELECT charge from  monthlyxxxxxxxxxxxxx where month LIKE '${year}-%' ORDER by month desc limit 1
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT charge from  monthlyxxxxxxxxxxxxx where month LIKE '${year}-%' ORDER by month desc limit 1

targets.queryText: SELECT usage from  monthlyxxxxxxxxxxxxx where month LIKE '${year}-%' ORDER by month desc limit 1
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT usage from  monthlyxxxxxxxxxxxxx where month LIKE '${year}-%' ORDER by month desc limit 1

targets.queryText: SELECT year as "年份",usage as "电/KWh",charge as "电/￥" from yearlyxxxxxxxxxxxxx   where year in (${year:csv})
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT year as "年份",usage as "电/KWh",charge as "电/￥" from yearlyxxxxxxxxxxxxx   where year in (${year:csv})

targets.queryText: SELECT SUBSTR(month, 1, 10) AS "月份", usage as "电量/kWh", charge as "金额/CNY"  from  monthlyxxxxxxxxxxxxx where month LIKE '${year}-%' order by month asc
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT SUBSTR(month, 1, 10) AS "月份", usage as "电量/kWh", charge as "金额/CNY"  from  monthlyxxxxxxxxxxxxx where month LIKE '${year}-%' order by month asc

targets.queryText:
SELECT 
    SUBSTR(date, 1, 10) AS "日期",
    usage AS "电量/kWh"
FROM 
    dailyxxxxxxxxxxxxx
WHERE 
    date LIKE '${year}-%'
ORDER BY 
    date ASC
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT 
    SUBSTR(date, 1, 10) AS "日期",
    usage AS "电量/kWh"
FROM 
    dailyxxxxxxxxxxxxx
WHERE 
    date LIKE '${year}-%'
ORDER BY 
    date ASC
